name: BattleAnimalQuiz
0:
”Alexa open battle animal quiz”
”Alexa play battle animal quiz”
”Alexa launch battle animal quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: battle animal quiz
des:
You step into a time machine to escape COVID 19 and you end up in 1020. The time machine breaks and in order to fix it, you will need a huge supply of gold. 

You make allies with the local king and exchange your Iphone for his army. Unfortunately, he has now abandoned all military responsibilities now passes his time taking selfies and creating medieval memes. 

You must lead the army into battle. Which animal would you ride into battle?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
